dataDirectories.description: An object containing keys for the various data paths.

certs.description: The directory containing the TLS certificates that the Docker client and server will use to communicate.

data.description: The directory containing the actual user workspace data. This is what will get mounted into `/vscode`.

dockerData.description: The directory containg the Docker daemon data. This will be used to preserve any built/pulled images and container data. If you do not care about preserving Docker images between restarts, you can mount this to `/tmp` or another tmpfs directory.

targetHostname.description: The hostname of the kubernetes node that will run the workspace. The hostname is the `kubernetes.io/hostname` label for the node.
